title: What is BadGPT? Ever heard about it?
description: If intent is wrong, then artificial intelligence can be a lethal tool in the hands of the wrong person. Imagine you are on night duty and you get a call from your home telling you that there is a man standing at your door with a gun in his hands. And your entire family is […]

title: Red & Yellow’s Free AI Course Transforms South African Education
description: In a path-breaking effort to use technology as a robust tool for teaching, education practitioners from South Africa should be able to access an exclusively online course complete with Red and Yellow Creative School of Business (Red and Yellow) support. This course, named “AI for educators,” is intended for the clearance of the veil of […]

title: Ripple’s Stablecoin Ambitions Could Propel XRP to $12, Says Expert
description: Ripple is set to issue a stablecoin on its XRP Ledger, and according to one expert, the projected growth in the stablecoin market cap to $2.8 trillion could flow into the XRP ecosystem. The expert says that XRP will surge by 20x by 2028 to hit $12, pushing its market cap to $658 billion, making [...]
